forum.content:
I just realize you from the movie that the Imitation game. U r really awesome!!
If your life can reborn in 21st century, you will have different destiny.
you know what? Cz the Big Apple agreed homosexuals marriage. Even America did also.
Cheers! have a nice dream for myself.

有時，被世人遺棄的人，才能成就大事。 From 模仿遊戲
forum.title: To Alan Turing
